text.text: Welcome to the armory addendum of Materials and You.

If you're reading this, that means that you must be an intrepid tinkerer looking to enter the world of armor. This guide will help you along your journey in creating the perfect suit(s) of armor. You'll find information about the tinkering tables you'll need and how various materials and items can affect the outcome of your armor piece.
Outside of these foundations, the rest is up to you. Happy tinkering!
